_comment: Termius Host Configuration Template for Claude VPS
_note: Termius doesn't support direct JSON import, but this documents the configuration. Use Termius sync or manually configure these settings.

alternative_addresses.note: Get your Tailscale IP with: tailscale ip

snippets.label: Start Claude
snippets.description: Start Claude in new tmux session

deep_links.note: Use these URLs in notifications to open Termius directly to this host

mosh_settings.note: Enable Mosh in Termius for better mobile stability. Requires mosh installed on VPS: sudo apt install mosh && sudo ufw allow 60000:61000/udp

recommended_apps.ios_keyboard: Default iOS keyboard with dictation enabled
recommended_apps.android_keyboard: Hacker's Keyboard (Play Store) for full key access

setup_steps: 1. Install Termius from App Store / Play Store
2. Create new host with settings above
3. Generate SSH key in Termius and export public key to VPS
4. Add public key to ~/.ssh/authorized_keys on VPS
